name: Doganium Reactor
description:
STORY

A nuclear reactor is heating up.
It will explode, if you don't cool it down.

But there are enemy robots that are getting closer.
They are trying to explode the reactor.

You must kill them before reactor explodes.


How to Play:

Press WASD to move.
Press left/right mouse button to shoot hot/cold ammos.
Reactor temperature increases 10 Celals every second.
Every robot has 2 hp. They die if you hit them twice with hot ammos.
If you kill a robot, you will gain 2 cold ammos.
Cold ammos make robots slower for 3 seconds.
Cold ammos decrease reactor temperature 15 Celals.
Hot ammos increase reactor temperature 5 Celals.
If a robot hits reactor, temperature increases 20 Celals.
